title: Cardano Blockchain Transactions Jumped 49% Last Quarter as ADA Sentiment Grew
description: Blockchain load – a measure of how much data is contained in blocks over a certain period – rose to 50% in the second quarter from under 40% in the first. It peaked at 81% in May.

title: Long-Term Bitcoin Holder Metric Hits New All-Time High
description: On-chain data shows Bitcoin long-term holders now hold 14.599 million BTC, the highest value the metric has ever seen.

title: Stablecoin Deposits on Maker Soar as DAI Interest Rates Hit 8%
description: The amount of DAI minted and deposited back into the Maker protocol has surged dramatically since the latest upgrade.

title: Ether Whale Burned 2,500 ETH; Ethereum Community Questions Motives
description: Ethereum community puzzled as an unknown entity sends 2,500 ETH to burn address: What could be the reason?

title: Bitcoin Maxi Bets $1 Million on BTC Surpassing $100,000 ATH Before 2024 Halving

title: YGG Price Initiates a Pullback as Investors Begin to Dump Tokens
description:
Lookonchain, the smartmoney on-chain platform, has observed an ongoing dump of YGG tokens by investors. In a recent tweet, the crypto on-chain data platform noticed significant YGG transfers into centralized exchanges.
